name: Air Hunter
description:
Air Hunter is a challenging game that will give you a battle-field like experience. With amazing graphics and theme, all you have to swing with your fighter and kill the enemies travelling your way. Keep in mind that you have unlimited amount of bullets to destroy the fighter.

FEATURES:
* Experience an epic.
* Destroy wave upon wave of enemies
* Reaching higher ranks will unlock new planes.
* Realistic war environment
* 3 planes
* Unlimited bullets
